content: HIT-Glass Positioning aid Foam positioning aid to center and align glass panes in the metal shoe, for use with the HIT-HY 270 adhesive anchor ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Glass balustrade installation ### FEATURES:Features Faster glass pane alignment – the positioning aid quickly aligns and holds glass panes securely in the metal shoe, enabling easier injection of HIT-HY 270 mortar Greater flexibility – available as a continuous profile, allowing you to cut the foam to your desired length to adapt to your specific application needs Multiple sizes available – foam available in two thicknesses, helping you accommodate the gap between the glass pane and metal shoe Applications Ideal for serial installation of glass panels into metal shoes Fastening glass panes for internal and external glass balustrades and handrails Fastening glass panes on curved and vertically inclined surfaces (up to 35°) in glass balustrade applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2433317 - Insert HIT-Glass EP 9.5 foam - Package Size 1 pc - 2395775 - Glass Handrail Foam Centralizer - Package Size 500 pc Package Contents: - 1x U 0-30/70/60mm HMP Centralizer
